doc.after: On 20 August 2011 thousands came to show their support for Hazare 117 while his advisers made television appearances to rally public support and defend themselves against criticism that their protest campaign and refusal to compromise is undermining India s parliamentary process 118 The National Campaign for People s Right to Information NCPRI condemned Hazare s deadline for passing the bill as undermining democracy which operates by
